channel.title: Problem Solved / Lock
channel.description:
Okay I followed "Deathchaos9's" highscore tutorial, I get one error when compiling I was hoping if anyone could help me with this, here is the error i get
[code]src\server\model\players\Client.java:637: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SQL location: class server.model.players.Client SQL.saveHighScore(this); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]
Here is a link to the tutorial I followed http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html
Okay after researching & looking up on the error I finally realised that I didn't add this import server.util.SQL; Which declares it.
Thanks deathchaos9 awesome tutorial hopefully my highscores work

item.title: Problem Solved / Lock
item.dc:creator: @Eraa Eraa
item.description:
@Eraa wrote:

Okay I followed “Deathchaos9’s” highscore tutorial, I get one error when compiling I was hoping if anyone could help me with this, here is the error i get

[code]src\server\model\players\Client.java:637: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable SQL
location: class server.model.players.Client
SQL.saveHighScore(this);
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

Here is a link to the tutorial I followed

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Okay after researching & looking up on the error I finally realised that I didn’t add this
import server.util.SQL;
Which declares it.

Thanks deathchaos9 awesome tutorial hopefully my highscores work
